think_procedure: First, I looked at the function of the 'innodb_lru_scan_depth' knob in MySQL. It determines how much of the buffer pool is scanned to find pages to evict. Then, I checked if there are any special values such as -1 or 0 that change the function of this knob. I found that there are no such special values. Therefore, I concluded that it is not a 'special' knob.
